Ground Truth: ATTEMPTED MURDER OF A MERCHANT.

Ground Truth: AT the Bow-street Police-court, five men named James Palmer, Samuel Scandland, Leon Weiner, Adolphe Weiner, and Daniel Jacoby, have been charged with being concerned with a man (already convicted) named Dusant, with attempting to murder Jules Tabak, a diamond merchant, and stealing £2,000 worth of diamonds.
